problem.markdown:
Instead of throwing away the loaves at the end of the day, Hungary Nerds realized they can be sold at a discounted price of $0.25 per loaf at store closing.
>>What quantity should they now order to maximize profit? (Round to the nearest integer)<<
= 668+-6

numericalresponse.p: Instead of throwing away the loaves at the end of the day, Hungary Nerds realized they can be sold at a discounted price of $0.25 per loaf at store closing.
numericalresponse.label: What quantity should they now order to maximize profit? (Round to the nearest integer)
